gw.xml.ws

Class WsiExportableUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.xml.ws.WsiExportableUtil

  • public class WsiExportableUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    this class has methods to work with WsiExportable classes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void marshal(XmlElement el, java.lang.Object obj)
      This will marshal the object, if exportable, into xml
      static java.lang.Object unmarshal(XmlElement el, IType type)
      This will unmarshal the element, provided it is exportable

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        obj - the object

      • unmarshal

        public static java.lang.Object unmarshal(XmlElement el,
                         IType type)
        This will unmarshal the element, provided it is exportable
        Parameters:
        el - the element to unmarshal
        type - the expected type
        Returns:
        the value
